thread.title: Jeremy Kyle guest who bonded with his dead brother’s baby left heartbroken after DNA bombshell proves the boy wasn’t his
thread.title_full: Jeremy Kyle guest who bonded with his dead brother’s baby left heartbroken after DNA bombshell proves the boy wasn’t his

title: Jeremy Kyle guest who bonded with his dead brother’s baby left heartbroken after DNA bombshell proves the boy wasn’t his
text:
Mrs Crunch 'So emotional!' Jeremy Kyle guest who bonded with his dead brother’s baby left heartbroken after DNA bombshell proves the boy wasn’t his 
Rob stormed off stage and burst into floods of tears. He was too emotional to speak on camera and was taken away by Graham By SARAH BARNS
